name: UseResponse
author: Brendan Coles <bcoles@gmail.com>
description: UseResponse is a fully customizable, open-source, self-hosted customer feedback software and support system

matches.text: title="Customer Feedback Software, Community Support System" target="_blank" href="http://www.useresponse.com" class="popup-logo">
